analyzed: hetu duka dassanena apahātabba duka ādi

original: Hetuṁ dassanena pahātabbaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu nadassanena pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: hetum dassanena pahātabbam dhammam paṭicca na hetu na dassanena pahātabbaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi adhipatiyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi

original: Nahetuṁ nadassanena pahātabbaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā nanahetu nanadassanena pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: na hetum na dassanena pahātabbam dhammam paccayā na na hetu na na dassanena pahātabbaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi

original: Hetuṁ bhāvanāya pahātabbaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu nabhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: hetum bhāvanāya pahātabbam dhammam paṭicca na hetu na bhāvanāya pahātabbaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi adhipatiyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi

original: Nahetuṁ nabhāvanāya pahātabbaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā nanahetu nabhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: na hetum na bhāvanāya pahātabbam dhammam paccayā na na hetu na bhāvanāya pahātabbaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi

original: Hetuṁ dassanena pahātabbahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu nadassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe ekaṁ …pe… sahajāte pañca …pe… avigate pañca.
analyzed: hetum dassanena pahātabba hetukam dhammam paṭicca na hetu na dassanena pahātabba hetukaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā hetuyā tīṇi ārammaṇe ekam pe sahajāte pañca pe avigate pañca

original: Nahetuṁ nadassanena pahātabbahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nanahetu nanadassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
analyzed: na hetum na dassanena pahātabba hetukam dhammam paṭicca na na hetu na na dassanena pahātabba hetukaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā ekam pe avigate eka

original: Hetuṁ bhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko
analyzed: hetum bhāvanāya pahātabba hetukam dhammam paṭicca na hetu na bhāvanāya pahātabba hetukaḥ

original: dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe ekaṁ …pe… sahajāte
analyzed: dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi ārammaṇe ekam pe sahajāte

original: Nahetuṁ nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nanahetu nanabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na hetum na bhāvanāya pahātabba hetukam dhammam paṭicca na na hetu na na bhāvanāya pahātabba hetukaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā hetuyā ekam pe avigate eka saṅkhitta
